name: Port of Skiffs
role_in_state: Primary riverine transshipment and small-ship repair hub
culture_adjustments: Crew-centric social networks supplant some clan authority
Contracts and tariffs practiced as public ritual
Ancestor-feasts staged aboard vessels and at quays
Oral navigational lore codified into local pilot guilds
constraints: Dependence on imported reagents for ritual trade
notes: Guilds control pilot licenses and tariff enforcement
High turnover of transient crews shapes local custom
